title: A SNP object — CreateSNPObj
code: CreateSNPObj(   snp_anno,   snp_data,   annotate_AA = T,   metadata = NULL,   remove_genes_dt = NA,   verbose = F )

title: A SNP object — CreateSNPObj
text: snp_anno Required. Generated Integrate_data() function. snp_data Required. Generated Integrate_data() function. metadata Optional.Samples metadata without corresponding mutation identification automatically removed. remove_genes_dt Optional. dataframe containing removed genes. column dataframe matched example(Mtb_removed_gene_dt). Currently, working mutation analysis Mycobacterium tuberculosis, can directly use presetted remove_genes_dt providing value "Mtb".
